code: import React from'react';import'./Dashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FAQ=()=>{const faqs=[{question:"How do I submit a complaint?",answer:"Login to your account, go to 'Raise a Complaint', fill out the form with your issue details, and submit. You'll receive a tracking ID."},{question:"How can I track my complaint status?",answer:"Use the 'Track Complaint' feature with your tracking ID to check the current status of your complaint."},{question:"What types of complaints can I submit?",answer:"You can submit complaints related to billing, service issues, technical problems, account issues, or other general concerns."},{question:"How long does it take to resolve a complaint?",answer:"Resolution time varies by complaint type. Billing issues typically take 24-48 hours, while technical issues may take up to 24 hours."},{question:"Can I view all my previous complaints?",answer:"Yes, go to 'My Complaints' section to view all your submitted complaints and their current status."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",style:{maxWidth:'800px',margin:'40px auto'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Frequently Asked Questions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Find answers to common questions about our complaint management system"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"faq-list",children:faqs.map((faq,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",style:{marginBottom:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{color:'#2c3e50',marginBottom:'15px'},children:faq.question}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'#555',lineHeight:'1.6'},children:faq.answer})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'30px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{color:'#2c3e50',marginBottom:'15px'},children:"Still have questions?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'#555',marginBottom:'20px'},children:"Contact our support team or submit a complaint for personalized assistance."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:()=>window.history.back(),children:"Go Back"})]})]});};export default FAQ;
